Description_lang: When you kill an enemy, you summon a Healing Sphere, healing you for $125355s1 when you walk through it.$?s322719[When you kill an enemy with Blackout Kick, you have a $322719m1% chance to summon a Chi Sphere, granting 1 Chi when you walk through it.][]

description_blz.en_US: When you kill an enemy, you summon a Healing Sphere, healing you for 1,030 when you walk through it.
description_blz.es_MX: Cuando matas a un enemigo, invocas una Esfera de sanación que te sana 1,058 p. cuando la atraviesas.
description_blz.pt_BR: Ao matar um inimigo, você evoca uma Esfera Curativa que cura em 1.050 se você atravessá-la.
description_blz.de_DE: Wenn Ihr einen Gegner tötet, beschwört Ihr eine heilende Sphäre, die Euch um 1.025 Gesundheit heilt, wenn Ihr durch sie hindurchlauft.
description_blz.en_GB: When you kill an enemy, you summon a Healing Sphere, healing you for 1,054 when you walk through it.
description_blz.es_ES: Cuando matas a un enemigo, invocas una esfera de sanación que te sana 1066 p. si la atraviesas.
description_blz.fr_FR: Lorsque vous tuez un ennemi, vous invoquez une sphère de soins qui vous rend 1061 points de vie lorsque vous la traversez.
description_blz.it_IT: L'uccisione di un nemico evoca una Sfera Curativa, che rigenera 1.025 salute quando vi si passa attraverso.
description_blz.ru_RU: При убийстве противника вы можете призвать целительную сферу, пройдя через которую вы восполните 1031 ед. здоровья.
description_blz.ko_KR: 적을 직접 처치하면 치유의 구슬이 소환됩니다. 치유의 구슬을 통과해 지나가면 1,048의 생명력을 회복합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 當你殺死目標時，可召喚出一顆治療玉，觸碰時可恢復1,043點生命力。
description_blz.zh_CN: 杀死一名敌人时会召唤一颗疗伤珠。当你穿过它时，会为你恢复1,030点生命值。
